text: Everything ’ s fine between Sofia Richie and Scott Disick! The couple were spotted on a date just 3 weeks after cheating rumors floated around. Scott even got a bit handsy! See the pics! Scott Disick, 35, and Sofia Richie, 19, just proved that their relationship is as strong as ever. The pair met up for a smoothie date, and were all smiles as they were photographed leaving Sun Life Organics in Calabasas. At one point, Kourtney Kardashian ‘ s ex - boyfriend even pinched the model ’ s butt while she laughed at his antics. Cute! See the PDA pictures of Scott and Sofia here.
